price: 71. Dijeron: “Adoramos ídolos y estamos entregados a su culto”.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
